TopicTitle: The Absurd High-Energy Solar Impact challenge

Articles.Content:
Get the highest mass to crash into the sun. As entry speeds aren\'t affected as much by fuel use, just concentrate on the highest mass. The speed at which your command module gets destroyed is the speed you calculate with

Edit: This thread is named after The Absurdly Energetic Munar Impact Challenge, as both have a similar premise. If you\'re reading this, go check it out 8)
Last time i checked you can\'t actually crash into the sun... you could still calculate the kinetic energy you have while passing trough the middle...
The sun\'s been an impactable object since v 0.14. The challenge description implies it\'s a paid-version-only challenge.
